entities.name: selector21
entities.description: Pipeline de walk-forward com ensemble ML (XGBoost, RF, LR) para trading BotScalp com otimização automática de features

entities.name: RAGv2
entities.description: Sistema avançado de Retrieval-Augmented Generation com multi-agent architecture, Chain-of-Thought prompts e temporal weighting agressivo

entities.name: VectorStore
entities.description: ChromaDB-based vector embedding store com chunking determinístico para semantic search

entities.name: BacktestEngine
entities.description: Motor de backtesting para estratégias de trading com walk-forward validation

entities.name: MCPMemory
entities.description: Model Context Protocol memory system com async search para conversation history

entities.name: BotScalpBrain
entities.description: Sistema inteligente de feedback loop com pattern discovery e aprendizado contínuo (Phase 4)

entities.name: FeatureEngineering
entities.description: Engenharia de features para ML trading (microstructure, technical indicators, deep features)

entities.name: MarketData
entities.description: Sistema de coleta e armazenamento de dados de mercado (klines, aggTrades, bookDepth) com formato parquet otimizado

entities.name: ASTChunker
entities.description: Chunking inteligente por AST para Python preservando semantic boundaries (Phase 4)

entities.name: RAGTracer
entities.description: Sistema de tracing detalhado com OpenTelemetry-style spans para RAG pipeline (Phase 3)

entities.name: auto_evolution_system
entities.description: Motor que intercepta eventos, roda análises dual-AI (Claude + GPT) e propõe patches automáticos

entities.name: serena
entities.description: MCP/LSP para navegar e editar código com segurança (find_symbol, replace_symbol_body)
